config: On October 31st, we held our third Justia Ghoulie Awards! This is undoubtedly one of the most expected, exciting, and entertaining Justia events throughout the year. Once again, we had fantastic and spooktacular costumes. Thank you for participating and showing off your costumes in this yearâ€™s edition. We are already looking forward to having another successful edition full of enthusiasm and creativity! Congratulations to all the most-voted contestants in each category!
